bmp280_ros.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 from bmp280_driver import BMP280
4 
5 import rospy
6 from bmp280.msg import bmp280_data
7 from std_msgs.msg import Header
8 
9 sensor = BMP280(0x77)
10 
11 def publisher():
12  pub = rospy.Publisher('rov/bmp280', bmp280_data, queue_size=3)
13  rospy.init_node('bmp280')
14  rate = rospy.Rate(3) #3Hz data read
15 
16  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
17  msg = bmp280_data()
18  header = Header()
19 
20  sensor.updateValues()
21 
22  msg.tempC = sensor.getTempuratureC()
23  msg.pressureP = sensor.getPressureP()
24  msg.pressureA = sensor.getPressureA()
25  msg.altitudeM = sensor.getAltitudeM()
26 
27  #update message headers
28  header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
29  header.frame_id = 'pressure_data'
30  msg.header = header
31 
32  pub.publish(msg)
33 
34  rate.sleep()
35 
36 if __name__ == '__main__':
37  try:
38  publisher()
39  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
40  pass
